website_summaries.verdict: Contains a good variety of oils, including some unique blends, although the bottles are half the size of most other sets.
pros: This set comes with 14 bottles (all 5 milliliter), including standard oils like cedar wood and frankincense
Features blends like Breathe Blend and Good Sleep Blend
A good variety of potent oils
cons: some just pour oil out, while with others it's hard to get any oil out of them at all
Bottles are much smaller than other sets

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Will not be purchasing again for several reasons: three bottles out of 14 seemed to be leaking when it arrived. I could smell the oils through two boxes, right away knew they had leaked. I like my dropper to drop one drop at a time, rather than poor out really fast and uncontrollable. The "oil" consistency is that of water. Possibly another reason it comes out so fast. There is no information where the oil itself came from, yet package states "100% pure and natural. Therapeutic grade essential oils" but they provide no proof of this. I would not use these on my body for this reason. Overall, stick with what you know. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Haley mae

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I KNEW that good essential oils are expensive per bottle. Yet I bought these. They had a yucky smell, like they all smelled the same. And the aroma they did put off was very faint and didn’t last long. Also they poured out fast from the bottle instead of slow drips. I bought one bottle of Thieves essential oil which is a yummy blend of cinnamon and clove. It actually smells like those Xmas ribbon candy from my childhood. It’s worth the money and it leaves a nice fragrance all day. I do not recommend the Artizen oils.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedaisy

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Most of these oils don't smell good. They have a chemical-y smell. I was too excited to get these only to be super disappointed. Would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Makeup Momma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the robbers oil, breathe, and muscle oils. I was however disappointed in the eucalyptus, tea tree, rosemary, and most especially the lavender. They have a weird almost old smell to them. It's as if the oils were made from ingredients that have started to go bad. They have a funk to them. I would not recommend this product as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set. The oils are very high quality, and it includes all the important basics. My only complaint is that it’s tricky to get the drops to dispense consistently... some bottles you really have to shake, some the oil drips out too fast. But the oils themselves are great, very potent. Overall I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: North Coast Margaret

customer_reviews.title: The fragrances are so nice and potent not a watered down like some others
customer_reviews.text: The fragrances are so nice and potent not a watered down like some others. Will purchase again, hopefully, there are larger size quantities.
customer_reviews.author: Laticia L.

customer_reviews.title: Take your pick
customer_reviews.text: I love the wide variety of scents with these oils. There are 14 but endless amount of mixes that you can come up with.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie48708

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is better to continue to purchase well-known and well-used products
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the bottles leaked. The overall scents were not pleasant. I will never order this product again. I guess it is better to continue to purchase well-known and well-used products. I was truly disappointed. Even my granddaughter said they were inferior to her essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn tynecki

customer_reviews.title: Broken items
customer_reviews.text: My package came today and I immediately noticed that something wasn’t right . I opened the box to find the oils box open and bottles broke 😩
customer_reviews.author: Michey

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality oils. I added a few to a gift basket and kept the rest for myself. I will be buying more. Update- 4/26 -- I had to let people know the Breathe Right oil really works. I woke up early today with the worst stuffy nose from allergies. I was a total mouth breather. Out of desperation I dug out this oil in Hope's I would get a little relief. At first I held the open bottle under my nose and inhaled then I put a little on my finger tips and held them under my nose. It was amazing My nose started to clear right up. I can only imagine what it would do in a vaporizer.
customer_reviews.author: DymondDiva

customer_reviews.title: COMPLAINT
customer_reviews.text: My name is Gennifer. Michael is my fiance and the essential oil set was a gift he purchased for me. I'm not happy. The bottles are tiny. The WORST part is, the fragrance fades within minutes. I am also EXTREMELY upset about the consistency which is like water, NOT thick at all. PLUS the bottles aren't even full! I have several complaints. Please contact me promptly so these problems can be resolved. pol_gen@yahoo.com Gennifer
customer_reviews.author: michael/gennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, watered down
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my initial review. Initially I reviewed 2 stars but after two weeks of use, I am upgrading to 4 star. A reason for the amended response is the price, $19 is extremely cheap for 14 oils, even in small bottles. I felt these oils are watered down - mainly because just turning some bottles upside down 5-7 drops would fall out like spilling water. Other bottles a turn upside might yield 1-2 thick drops (not watered down). Some of the oils were thicken in substance than others, in any event they all smell pretty good. I was disappointed initially, but for the price and amount it is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSacramento

customer_reviews.title: Was not as described
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived earlier than expected which was great...however; It was one bottle leaking when it arrived; the tops were not secure; the product was watery and most smells were alike to include the smells did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling essential oil set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of the scents. I'm pretty picky when it comes to mixed scents but all of them are perfect! My favorite mix is the Breath oil and whenever my allergies start acting up I use some in the diffuser/ in the bath. I use the oils everyday in my business so it helps to find a bundle of scents that I have absolutely nothing bad to say about the product!
customer_reviews.author: Chike U.

customer_reviews.title: Helped to open my airways!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with pneumonia the day this arrived. I put the breathe in my diffuser for the rest of the day and used the good sleep in the diffuser in my bedroom. While I still need my medicine it seems to be opening my airways and making it a little easier to breath. I am in pain with each breath I take so I am having to use my nebulizer and use my rescue inhaler. But I really feel that the oils are helping with my respiration. I am excited to use the other oils once I get over this illness.
customer_reviews.author: Susieever

customer_reviews.title: Open bottle leads to great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this order with the sweet orange oil opened and drained out in the box (smelled lovely though). I was really disappointed as this is probably my favorite scent in the collection. Customer service that supplies the oils was super helpful and very generous and even offered either a refund or replacement of whole set whilst still keeping the original. In the end I agreed to just a new bottle of the orange and there was no problem with that!!! Very happy with the product and even more so with the customer service, they were prompt and professional and I will absolutely continue purchasing from them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: The cedarwood smells like cigarettes. The only good scents were lemon and ...
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers said, the scents smell fake/chemical. The cedarwood smells like cigarettes. The only good scents were lemon and orange. Losing the $5.99 in shipping to return it was better than keeping them. I'd recommend buying essential oils in-store so you can smell them firsthand before making a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, I am a person that likes instructions/product info sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I am a person that likes instructions/product info sheets! Especially for products that this is my first time using. And these came with absolutely 0 instructions. All it came with was a business card with an email address. Not even a link to a product info page. So I spent the first half hour looking up each blended oil, to find out which oils were in it and creating a spreadsheet listing them (they are listed on the bottle...however I dont have microscopic vision cant read writing that small. This was also true for the infuser I bought. No clue why companies go cheap on instructions, a real let down to us consumers.
customer_reviews.author: chris s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety Pack of Quality Oils
customer_reviews.text: Fourteen sample size bottles of high quality oils. Every scent so far has been great. I don't like Tea tree, so that's the only bottle I won't use. Nicely packaged, awesome assortment. The "Robbers" scent is one of the big winners. Don't know if I've ever smelled this exact blend before, but there are hints I recognize and it definitely fills the air with a unique, comforting fragrance. It has a strong cinnamon or clove like scent that is addicting. Highly recommended. Eligible for Prime. Seller is ultra communicative, soliciting feedback at every juncture of the sale. I will definitely broaden my horizons with other products from this company. Great product, price and service. A+ all the way
customer_reviews.author: shawnonamazon

customer_reviews.title: Bought the Artizen Aromatherapy Top 14 Essential Oil Set for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Artizen Aromatherapy Top 14 Essential Oil Set for my wife and she just loves it. She is especially crazy about the Robbers blend. The only thing she doesn't care for is how fast the oil comes out of the bottle, it makes it harder for her to make the blends with specific amounts of drops.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Leaky, empty bottle enclosed
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived in the mail, one of the bottles leaked all over the other bottles, and ruined some of the other labels on the other bottles. The smell of menthol was overwhelming. Needless to say, that bottle was completely empty. I didn't bother returning it, too busy to have to do that. Get it right the first time lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of One

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell right.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells off. A few are ok but even then they smell cheap and dirty. My sister is all about the Doterra or whatever it is, but I have no problem with carrier oils or whatever nonsense she spouts. I have been gifted doterra, tried artnaturals and have smelled other random brands coworkers and friends use and they were nice smelling with no distinguishable difference so don't see the point of spending top dollar on whatever doterra is selling. I am definitely going to try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N Riedel

customer_reviews.title: “A Sample of different varieties oil set”
customer_reviews.text: The price was really good for this oil set. I really like that it came with many varieties to choose from . The only thing was the scent wasn’t as strong as the other oil sets I bought. I think this oil set serves as a sampler so that you know which scent you’d buy next time. Also, the seller will make sure you are 💯 % satisfied. If you aren’t they would send you another free oil set . I think that’s a good way to keep their customers happy! I would highly recommend to buy if you are looking for the right scent for your home ! Thanks seller and amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Jessie D.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awful
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it got here on time is about the only good thing to say. None of the oils have a natural or even correct smell. In fact, everything has a scent of cinnamon to it when diffused. They’re also very oily in smell as well. Also, the glass bottles are so small that I didn’t even get through a week without my lavender one running out. I had an allergic reaction to putting a drop of the “muscle relaxing” oil on my skin. And I couldn’t hardly tell what was in it because the text on the bottle was so small. Bad, bad, and more bad.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of essential oils. I use one at work, and bought a second for home. My coworkers have asked me several times which oils I use, as they smell much better than the ones they use. I’m also impressed with the customer service I received when I received a package with a broken bottle. The company responded immediately and fixed the issue way faster than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Farr

customer_reviews.title: I do NOT recommend this cheap, low grade, oil!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL, CHEAP, LOW grade oils! I purchased these oils for 2 new oil diffuser/humidifiers. I had to use 20 to 30 drops of oils (2 to 4 oils) and did not smell any fragrance!! I have tried all of these oils and the scents of the oils disapate within 20 minutes. I will NEVER purchase this item again! I do NOT recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love these oils
customer_reviews.text: I love these oils. I use them for my diffuser. They are pretty potent but the price and the scents are great. I feel like it's a good assortment of blends. My favorites are Harmony, love, balance and cleaning. There is also one called robber's I believe it's an imitation of the popular Theives oil, but it doesn't really compare to it. All of the scents are pretty unique. By this I mean they all smell different I don't feel like your getting several oil blends that smell the same. I haven't had any issues with leaking or broken bottles. I really like these for the price it seems like a bargain to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tesha farlow

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Affordable Esssntial Oils
customer_reviews.text: I love my essential oil diffuser and rather than pay a lot for one bottle this package contains a sample of 14 different essential oils that appear to be of high quality. Actually I like the variety and mixing them is interesting as well. We all have our favorite oils but this variety suits well to combine with others without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: JDonna

customer_reviews.title: Leaking, tops not tightened all the way
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smells, but when I opened the packaging it had leaked and so 4 (tea tree, frankincense, robbers, and stress relief) of the bottles were practically empty. It was not sealed very well, that due to the oil leakage the labels are coming off. Not to mention the box it came in was stained and oily. The tops to the bottles were not tightened all the way. Not worth the money if I was only going to receive some bottles somewhat full and and 4 empty.And tea tree and stress relief were two that I was excited most about. Very disappointed. Am not very pleased with this product. Sorry to say, but will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Rayane Alves

customer_reviews.title: Some Bottles Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Received my oils today. But as I was unboxing, there was an overwhelming smell. Two of the bottles (Eucalyptus and Breathe) are almost empty. I don’t know if they leaked, But nothing was wet or stained, just the smell. Quality control did not do a thorough check. Some of the scents are not as strong as I’m used to and some of them are a bit strong right from the bottle. We’ll see the results as I us them in the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great variety in the 14 pack
customer_reviews.text: Great variety in the 14 pack! They smell great and do very well in diffusers! We run one at night with Breathe or eucalyptus to help ward off sickness and colds. This is a great start pack if you are thinking about using aromatherapy or diffusers. I also bought a bracelet, but haven’t used it yet. I’m thinking they or the necklaces would be great gifts! Love the products. Oils do tend to come out well/quickly unlike some other brands, so startconservatively.... a little goes a long way! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Willis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality oils.
customer_reviews.text: Lemon scent moderate. Lavender is awful and smells very old. Peppermint Scent moderate. Robbers is weird. Rosemary is good. Stress relief bottle half empty and smell is faint. Tea tree smells old. Sweet orange you can barely smell. Frankincense is good. Muscle Relief is fabulous. Breathe is good. Eucalyptus is good. Cedar wood is faint. Good sleep smells old. I won’t purchase again. The package is very attractive and if I saw it at a store, I’d pick it up. On the other hand, knowing the over quality of scents, I would not gift it to anyone. So overall, disappointed. I would not recommend it due to lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gann

customer_reviews.title: Very bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smells, but when I opened the packaging it had leaked and so 5 ( harmony, energy, meditation, robbers, and cleaning) of the bottles were practically empty. It was not sealed very well, that due to the oil leakage the labels are coming off. Not to mention the box it came in was stained and oily. The tops to the bottles were not tightened all the way. Not worth the money if I was only going to receive some bottles somewhat full and and 5 empty. Am not very pleased with this product. Sorry to say, but will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Rayane Alves

customer_reviews.title: The box came partially opened.. with a broken ...
customer_reviews.text: The box came partially opened.. with a broken bottle that leaked oil and glass bits on everything else. The rest of the items in my overall order had no issues so I don't believe it was a shipping problem. The box itself should have more protection for these bottles, as this is now a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An experiment in self care
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. I bought a diffuser to go with them and every night before bed it’s part of my routine to put a few drops of lavender or “good sleep” in my diffuser and put a few drops on my wrists and behind my ears and I haven’t slept so well in ages. I’m not exactly an “essential oils” person and am 99% sure the routine is psychosomatic but I love how it smells and I feel better, so it’s worth it. None of my bottles were broken or unsealed though I could smell them through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: First purchase was fine and given as a gift. Second time I purchased it was a mess. Lids were loose, one bottle was empty, several others were almost empty. Labels had water damage, package was damaged. I returned and requested a replacement and hope it works out. I won't take a chance again, however. UPDATE: Received replacement package. One bottle empty, two only half full. Labels and package not damaged. Making progress here . . . but done with Artizen. Now wondering if the first that I gave as a gift had empty and partial bottles. Yikes!
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible, but I have my doubts about the purity of these oils, some are a bit chemically smelling and some hardly smell like anything at all! The cedar and the lavender ones are my favorite scents and normally pretty potent smelling, but the ones in this box are sooo weak there's no way they're 100 percent pure.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to essential oils but these don’t seem that great to me. I put some in my defused at night and let it run for 1-3 hours and the scent is great. The next day I turn on the defused and I smell nothing. I never had this issue with any other oils I purchased. It would be helpful if something on the bottles or in the box indicated when they are used for. Or maybe have some sort of instructions for use for those of us who don’t have hours to research.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in my new diffuser and they have been less then stellar. The scent doesn’t hang around. I’ve tried dropping quite a few drops and still, after about 30 minutes the scent is gone. I’ll go back to my astral sea oils. I won’t be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: These oils are fantastic when you consider value. It's a great starter kit if you are just starting to use oils and want to see what you like, or if you just want to start using good aromas around the house. If you are going to use oils with kids, I would look into higher quality brands with "KidSafe" options, and I would order individual oils (bigger bottles, better quality) after you know what you want. But these are good for now. Our favorite is "Breathe." Great for allergy season!
customer_reviews.author: Anjoli Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: They felt used.....
customer_reviews.text: I may have gotten a bad batch, who knows?!?!? Most of the bottles seemed like they were already used. When we opened the box, one or a couple of them had leaked and rubbed off most of the description on the stickers. Yes I was still able to salvage majority of them, yes they do own up to their smells (not watered down like other brands), no there isn't enough in the bottles (which I think this box was a return, after 4 drops or so, some of the bottles were empty....). Due to feeling like I got sent a returned/used box, my fair analysis is a 2.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Grady

customer_reviews.title: Plastic/chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the 'cheap' essential oils by aromar which are 2.2 Oz/65mL which you can find about anywhere for less than maybe $2? I've been obsessed with my diffuser so I thought maybe I should get 'better quality'. I absolutely don't understand how this recieved so many good reviews and is Amazon's choice. Every fragrance is faint you literally only smell like a plasticy/chemical. I most certainly do not advice anyone to purchase this crap especially since you are basically inhaling the chemicals!!! This is the worst thing I've ever brought on Amazon. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: They Really work
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they all smelled similar except for the citrus oils, I used the breathing oil and it worked on my stuffy nose, I used the Good Sleep and I don't remember dosing off. These are 5ml bottles but you use so very little. This is a great starter pack until you learn what you really love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy-Awful Mess-Half full leaking bottles
customer_reviews.text: This arrived a terrible wet mess and an assault on your sense of smell. The box was falling apart and wet, many of the labels were losing their writing from being wet so I couldn’t read what was in them (and they’re tiny to begin with), and over half of the seals on the bottles were twisted and broke suggesting-this was probably a return!!! The smell on my hands from all of the leaking bottles was horrible and took days to wear off. I’m getting tired of packing back up leaking product from Amazon. So in a double zip ziploc they sit.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Browning

customer_reviews.title: Good quality oils for a reasonable price..
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this pack of essential oils. The breath helps unclog my little noses in the house. I personally love the tea tree and robbers oil. My kids have eczema so I make my own lotions that works perfectly for their skin. I use lavender and frankincense in addition to other ingredients in my homemade lotion. It's not watered down. The package came in intact and not damaged. I love this starter pack from Artizen because you get to pick out favorites for a later order. My house smells good. Plus the kids sleep with a humidifier so a little drop of lavender helps them sleep better and longer... makes mama happy
customer_reviews.author: e.adjabeng

customer_reviews.title: I’m Salty AF
customer_reviews.text: I am more than upset with this product. Upon opening it 3 of the bottles lids were barely screwed on and had spilled in the box along their journey. Nothing better than opening a package full of scents just to have them pour out all over you and your belongings. Not to mention one of the bottles just straight up didn’t have a label on it. So to recap. All my belongings now smell like a hodgepodge of various scents. Half of the labels melted beyond recognition bc of the oil bath they took enroute and I’m missing about 10ml of product in total. Great first impression from this company 🙄
customer_reviews.author: David J. Yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really love these. They are the smaller size, but equivalent to the larger size, because the scent goes a long ways. They are also very clean. It’s hard to describe, but I just started getting into essential oils and there’s something so much more clean and refreshing about these oils compared to many others I have tried. There is a very nice mix of scents too! It took awhile to find the line I was going to stick with and it will definitely be this one.
customer_reviews.author: tpapera

customer_reviews.title: 2 bottles almost empty
customer_reviews.text: When I started to use the oils I found that the Sweet Orange and Rosemary oils were almost empty. The seal wasn't broken but the lid was loose. I could smell them when they were delivered but didn't see any sign of leaks on the outside of the box . Since I have already used some of the oils , I would like to have a replacement of those two bottles. If you want the entire box returned, I can do that but as I said I have started using some of them.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Barkus

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this set because it is a nice variety. When they arrived, I picked up the package and knew what it was because the scent was so strong and pleasant. Yeah ... realized I shouldn’t have been able to smell it through the packaging. Unwrapped, and sure enough, everything was coated in Sweet Orange oil. The bottle hadn’t broken, just leaked more than half out. It’s one of my favorites in the bunch, so it was disappointing to lose that one. Not worth returning when the rest of the items were fine ... but this was a bottling/manufacturing issue, not a packaging/shipping issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase on amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed. Somehow one of the bottles leaked during shipping. It was so overwhelming strong I couldn't keep it in the house because it burned my eyes. I could not tell which one because the oil had eaten off the writing on the label of the leaking bottle and 2 others. I ran a sink of hot soapy water to wash the rest and there goes those labels too not to mention they all still smell of that same overpowering scent. What a waste of $24.99 to just throw it in the trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Asquith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the essential oils so I’m still learning what oil to use for different purposes but I always have had an ant problem in the spring and I usually have to use vinegar every day to clean to get rid of them but I used the tea tree oil, peppermint, and orange essential oils and put them on a few lava rocks and placed them around sporadically and haven’t seen any ants yet. I refresh the rocks daily with a couple drops. So happy and can’t wait to find other uses for the oils. 💙
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: My Robbers bottle was broken all other bottles were fine are the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Batson

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I really love this oil set. After buying the first package I am ordering a second so I can have some for work and some for home. A few drops go a long way, the scents are strong and lovely. Glad I bought these rather than the 70 dollar set I was looking at from a more prestigious brand. Excellent quality fantastic price. I was worried about the get what you pay for effect and I am pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Few bad things....
customer_reviews.text: The bad definitely outweighs the good in this product. We use an essential oils diffuser nightly. Here is what I thought: Good: -A few of these blends smell awesome. That's about it. Bad: -Most of these don't smell too great. -Some of the bottles are not completely full. I was shocked when I started running out after using only appx 10 drops per bottle. - A couple of these smell like sweaty socks....
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Try the variety, see which works best for you.
customer_reviews.text: I've got to admit, I figured aromatherapy was hippy dippy baloney(bonus points if you caught that!) We started using it when our dear Boxer was ill, because we were willing to do anything to help. It helped him, it helped us. It continues to help us. Different oils DO have different effects. Try a variety, determine what helps you, or just which aromas you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: JimofSalem

customer_reviews.title: Can barely smell them!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of these in 2 different diffusers. I put substantially more drops of the oil than recommended. And still I can barely smell anything coming out of the diffuser. I've even compared these to a plug-n essential oil diffuser by Air Wick or one of those, and that one puts off so much more fragrance it's ridiculous. I don't know what else I could do to test, so based on this I would never buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: bball

customer_reviews.title: In love with the scent, not the box packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was smelling it even before I opened the bubble envelope! I love the smell, specially in my diffuser!! It is really the greatest thing. I also love that it has so much scents to it, for me it is like going to an ice cream shop 😂 anyways, I really wanted to give this a 5 stars but it bummed me that it is actually true.... the box it comes with were half open! Kinda sucks because if not careful, they could all fall on the floor and break!
customer_reviews.author: AC Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Only 5/14 Bottles in Tact
customer_reviews.text: I knew as soon as I opened the package there was some serious leakage-- a strong mix of every scent overwhelmed my senses. Out of the 14 bottles, 9 had clearly leaked (less than half left in the bottle) and rosemary, my favorite scent, was completely empty. I was looking forward to light scent of oils in my bedroom-- now I can't get the sickeningly overwhelming scent of the package out of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with 1 bottle missing, but it's the seller's fault IMHO
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with only 13 bottles inside. The Lemon oil was removed before shipping. I had also ordered a diffuser to use with these oils, and that package had also been opened & the power cord and measuring cup were missing. I'm betting the problems are a problem with the seller, not the manufacturer. I like the oils. Even the Robbers blend is nice, but not exactly like Young Livings Thieves. Still, a great scent. Too bad I got cheated by the seller. .
customer_reviews.author: Housemouse

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: These are so gross. They stink and are extremly strong in the stinky smell. I put just 2 drops of the stress relief in my diffuser and it gave me a headache 10 minutes in. Had to shut it off. I've used other brand of oils that are on here. And these are by far the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Would have gotten all 5 if it wasn't for
customer_reviews.text: The scent is strong since I smell throught the box. Makes sense since one of the bottles leaked. I didnt open any of the caps was planning on returning but will be such a hassle with the whole quarantine right now. So I hope the owner can just send me the one that is half missing in the bottle with the leak. It is the one I needed badly too called Breathe. Once I get a new bottle of breathe I will update the review but until then this is what I am giving then.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Weak and Scentless- smell good from the bottle but not in diffuser :(
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this brand of essential oils. It seems like they are very watered down or something due to the almost non existent aroma I get from them when I use them in my oil diffuser- which I use on a daily basis. I thought my diffuser was broken when after a couple days of using these oils, I stopped noticing any scents. I switched back to one of my old oils and magically the scent was back, proving that these oils are just weak and not worth buying, at least for aromatherapy purposes anyway. I’m glad my diffuser wasn’t broke and it was just these weak oils, but annoyed I wasted my money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smell great but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product smells great. My only issue is the delivery. The first box I received the oils were either used or leaked out as there was oil all over the box. The replacement box I received also has oil all over the box. At least three were only 1/4 full. Love and Harmony scents were empty.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, product smells chemical. Put a few drops of the lemon on my arm, within 10 minutes could not detect even a hint of lemon. Buyer beware pay cheap get cheap. No way they are 100 % pure there as runny as water. Box was oily, seals broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Naegele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing transport but great smells
customer_reviews.text: These smell amazing. I love the variety. They are very quality oils. But the stress relief, which is my favorite, is completely empty because it’s all over the packaging. Edited* I emailed the seller and the gave me a partial refund for the oil so that I can purchase another one. Really great, quick customer service. Highly recommend buying, just wish they would package more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: KC Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: It was literally just enough for 3 or four uses give or take for each bottle. Each tiny bottle was less than a quarter filled. Most of the scents were very similar except for a few of them. Very deceiving packaging, oils seemed to have spilled all over the inside even though the tiny battles appeared tight. Sents last very short time with or with out filler oil.
customer_reviews.author: ines garcia

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Spot-on Natural Smelling Scents
customer_reviews.text: Great way to sample various scents and in a variety of ways. Bottles provide plenty of uses to render an opinion of "likability". After many years of insomnia, I've had an excellent night's sleep EVERY night I've used the bedtime blend in my diffuser. A definite buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking. Multiple oils missing substantial amounts of liquid.
customer_reviews.text: Could smell the pungent aroma before opening the Amazon Package. I knew there must have been a leak right away. The fumes were so strong my eyes were watering, not even joking!!! The lavender oil is completely empty and a few others are less than half full. I’m so disappointed as this is one of my gifts for Mother’s Day. I’m not too familiar with essential oil scents, so I cannot comment on the “quality” of the oils themselves. It’s an oily, smelly mess in my house right now. Strong aromas that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: mjnield

customer_reviews.title: Different fill lines EDIT
customer_reviews.text: EDITED*** I emailed them and this is because they are filled by weight, so each oil may weight less or more resulting in the fill lines to be different. So I am satisfied now *********** To me, this is a good sampler for beginners. I was sceptcle to purchase seeing all the broken bottle reviews, but mine luckily were all put together. 100% looked like mine had been returned and then shipped to me. The bottles I got have multiple different fill lines. My picture it’s very hard to see so I added red arrow but over all I get to sample a lot of oils.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Christian

customer_reviews.title: Where will you store the bottles?
customer_reviews.text: Just received the products. I opened the box and I had to remove all the bottles to see the which bottle contained which essential oil. I had planned on using the box to store the bottles, but thats not really possible unless you take out nearly every bottle from the box to see the name of the oil. It would be a good idea if they labeled the tops of the bottle caps or created a grid on the box that indicated the location of the oils (like on a box of chocolate candy).
customer_reviews.author: Russisright

customer_reviews.title: Super upset.
customer_reviews.text: love the scents of these, some don't match their scents but it's okay. A few huge cons I have is that the bottles are so small that they only lasted me about a week. A few of them leaked all inside the box and others didn't have the cap screwed on all the way. A bit disappointed but tried to use them the best I could. I sadly don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: These oils may be cheap and small, but they smell AMAZING and make for a great tester kit if you're not sure what exactly you're looking for in essential oils. I had an issue where my Lemon essential oil managed to show up empty, so I contacted the company and they offered to send me a free replacement. For that alone, I'd recommend this kit, this brand, these oils, and these people, to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Obama

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: They leaked??!! Got a very strong mixed scent when arrived. Most of the containers are only 3/4 full. Some even half way empty. They smell very good and are very cute. Thought they were bigger but they are sample sized. Must have not read the description correct. Still a great price for the large variety. Put about 5 drops of the "breathe" one in my new diffuser and it's very potent. Would buy again. Especially if there's another set of different scents.
customer_reviews.author: LMN

customer_reviews.title: Feel good oils
customer_reviews.text: Use these everyday on my skin and in a diffuser. Noticeable difference resulting in better nights sleep and feeling more rejuvenated the next morning. After catching a cold, I started using this on the bottoms of my feet to help with my immune system and notice a great redcution in symptom duration.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I only use essential oils for diffusing and so often they come out smelling synthetic or harsh. These are neither, I am so pleased! Definitely comparable to the Big Name Brands/Crazy Expensive options. In my first shipment one of the seals on the bottles had broken and leaked everywhere. I contacted the seller and explained what had happened, they sent out a full set immediately to replace the damage. I am 100% pleased and will definitely be placing future orders!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baule

customer_reviews.title: don't buy these, came broken
customer_reviews.text: Three of the bottles came broken open and had oils all over the place. It smelled so strong when we opened the box it triggered my girlfriends asthma. I will not be buying these essential oils again. Even if they werent broken I wouldn't because they hardly smell at all. Put so many drops in and it doesn't smell hardly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Smells good different various bottles good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get more bottle than just the normal 1st box everything came fine and when I opened box on of the little bottle had dumped out (in tjebpic the stain 😢😢😢 Otherwise its wonderful the mix and match and the smeels are great I'm beginning to learn so I could possibly be buying again maybe next time one I dontbget t use this time I can next time...great smellsReaaly!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nichole

customer_reviews.title: All were in excellent condition. (No leaks) I am a newbie in ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews, I was a little sceptical, many said the oils had leaked! Not so for me, I ordered 3 one for me my daughter and my daughter in law. All were in excellent condition. (No leaks) I am a newbie in essential oils, I have a lot to learn, and will guide my girls and these oils are perfect for us, a big assortment of the best oils, a perfect starting place for someone wanting to get into the essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D

customer_reviews.title: Good essences smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: Package outside was perfect but when I opened it, a lot of oil had spilt. So when I was able to get the oils most of them were halfway filled or empty. I am very disappointed with it and I wanted to let you know. I want the company to send me a replacement package because the essences is very delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kestner

customer_reviews.title: They leaked Out during shipping
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived my entire order smelled so strong where they had mostly leaked out during shipping. The seals were still unsnapped but the caps came loose. Maybe 3 of them were full the rest were either half bottle or quarter of a bottle left inside the glass jars and Two was entirely empty Very sad but the one I really wanted was one of the 3 full bottles so I’m going to keep them. Just disappointed in the waste of what seems to be long lasting scents. Thank goodness they had it in a sealed bag or it would be Rosemary scented legos for everyone this Christmas haha!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly but my only issue is that the oils leaked a bit in packaging which caused the rest of my mail and box to smell like all the oils mixed together. Might just me a one time thing but might I suggest a better method of packaging so oils don't spill out. Other than that I am happy with item and they smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to essential oils but wanted a set that I could use to experiment with different blends. These oils arrived well packaged, wrapped in bubble wrap/padded envelope and tightly packed in their box. No leaks or anything, all the tops were still properly sealed. I blended lemon, lavender, and tea tree and it immediately felt like I was in a spa waiting for a massage! Can't wait to see what other great combinations I can come up with!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A little is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Hey there it's me CharlieT, I have been using Artizen Aromatherapy Essential Oil for over a week now. I use it in my air diffuser trust me you will only need a few drops the fragrance will warm the whole room. I mixed two oils together OMG the scent went into several of my rooms that I had to cut it off. I think you're enjoy the multiple 14 different essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very weak, I tried in my diffuser, bracelet and on my wrist . I’ve tried three different ones so far and all are very weak in scent. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem to work well in my diffuser. They smell very nice! They were package well but some still leaked out and smelt really bad and strong. After I removed them from the box and cleaned them all, it was all good. I'm guessing it is just hard to keep them from leaking a little when they are being shipped. Great sellers and great price!
customer_reviews.author: PinkLady

customer_reviews.title: ~~Smells like tooth paste bar soap and cleaning supplies!~~
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom and they smell like cleaning supplies tooth paste and bar of soap good idea didnt like the scents at all I bought these specifically BECAUSE OF THE 100% GURANTEE give it a shot you may like them if not reach out or send them back I think my mom will try the other set they have I told her she can pick herself which she would like! THEY DID ARRIVE NICE AND NEAT NO DAMAGE NONE BROKEN LIKE SOME OTHER REVIEWS
customer_reviews.author: Wishing

customer_reviews.title: Used for one night and me and my BF both woke up with sore throats
customer_reviews.text: I came from using Doterra oils, but was shopping around looking for alternatives. I tried these oils twice and I don't know what it was, but me and my BF both got sore throats after trying these with my usual mix of different oils. I returned them immediately and tried out the Plant Therapy brand and couldn't be happier now.
customer_reviews.author: KM.

customer_reviews.title: good strong sent,terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: while the box they came in was well presented,it was too thin and flimsy to survive USPS handling and one of the bottle lids was cracked,leaking out most of the rosemary oil. The overall product is good and would have been perfect if not for the leaking bottle. I will,however try it one more time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Billger

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of them smell yucky
customer_reviews.text: I gave all of my relatives diffusers for gifts, and got a couple of these collections and broke them up so that everyone had a few to try. About half of them were nasty and I couldn't decide who to stick them with. Ended up giving them the nicer ones and the stinky ones are still in my kitchen drawer waiting for me to toss them out. Nice idea in theory.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: that these are great quality oils and work very well!
customer_reviews.text: A variety of things - I'm actually using all of them in one way or another - for sleep/relaxation - drinking peppermint drops in water (yummy - same with lemon and orange!!!) - muscle relief - I made a mix of my own which is helping with inflammation/arthrisis; frankincense for dark spots (really going well!!!) - I've ordered this before and will continue to do so - a few of the oils I've ordered larger, individual sizes - but otherwise, the set is working beautifully for me. - Sarah
customer_reviews.author: Alan R.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. This is my third time ordering this exact set. However somewhere along the line from manufacturing to arrival one vials cap became partially unscrewed but seal wasn't broken. Half the vial was spilled. The essential oil scent was extremely strong upon opening shipping package
customer_reviews.author: Petals4tracey

customer_reviews.title: Combined scents only... not specific.
customer_reviews.text: I must say, quality and packaging seemed okay. However, these are NOT individuals essential oil scents. Rather, they’re blends with several scents in each vile. For this, I was not pleased. It wasn’t made clear in the description that you’re not getting the actual specific scents that are listed. They’re just a mixed hodgepodge.
customer_reviews.author: CaliConsumer

customer_reviews.title: VERY poor packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor packaging. I ordered this with some vitamin E. The vitamin E was open and leaked all into the packaging. The box the essential oils came is was open and so was the lemon essential oil. The products went all into the packaging, my hands and my counter tops. I was very excited about this order, unfortunately, it all went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: The perfect starter kit! I love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first use of aromatherapy! I love it. I also purchased almond oil as a carrier, and a bracelet I periodically add drops to durring the day. If I feel anxious, i smell my bracelets and relax. Look, it's not your mother's pacholli, it is way better. Do not add the oil to your skin without adding a carrier or piece of jewelry, as it can cause skin irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: An amazing assortment of oils to suit various needs. I read online people would mix various scents to achieve certain purposes (like sweet orange and lavender for sleeping), but this assortment comes with pre-mixed blends that suit a wide variety of needs already. The packaging is also really nice and the bottles have a decent amount of oil inside.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent oils at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This product came properly packaged to ensure delivery without loss of any essential oils. Each bottle was sealed and full. We have not gotten into the stress relief or other combination scents yet, but all of the oils we have used have been great. Not weak, but not overly cloying or strong. Perfect for our diffuser. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelley

customer_reviews.title: This Variety will satisfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice scents. I usually aquire my E Oils in lager sizes. This is for a new atomizer and I have no clue about what I am doing. This assortment will help me decide what to get in larger volumes. The variety is awesome! I am recommending the assortment it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff ...No trail name Yeti

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Being new to an oil diffuser, the variety pack was good for me until I was able to determine which scents I like. I felt these oils aren't that strong. I had to add lots of drops to my diffuser in order to smell them and then they only worked for a short time until the scent died down. Next time, I will be investing in a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kinda bummed by this purchase. I got my first oil diffuser and thought this was a good deal and a nice way to sample various scents before settling on my favorite. Unfortunately, none of these smell very nice. Many of them have a strong chemical odor. I ended up going to Bath and Body Works at the mall and found much better options and bought a few different oils from them. I only use those and will be disposing of these unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: SinSin

customer_reviews.title: Aromathery Oil Scents
customer_reviews.text: Order came and the scent was strong while opening the packaging. Realized it was that strong because some of the bottles were leaking. One of the bottles was completely empty and 3 others were at half bottle. Had to wipe things down from the leaking bottles (which also removed some of the scent names from the labels). Other than that, the scents are lovely and the bottles are a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Earline N.

product_meta.title: Artizen Aromatherapy Top 14 Essential Oil Set (100% PURE & NATURAL) Therapeutic Grade Essential Oils - All of Our Most Popular Scents and Best Essential Oil Blends
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Aromatherapy Top 14Artizen Essential Oils Set of 14
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING SCENTS – Lavender, Frankincense, Eucalyptus,Breathe Blend, Cedarwood, Sweet Orange, Rosemary, Good Sleep Blend, Tea Tree, Stress Relief Blends, Lemon, Peppermint, Robbers, and Muscle Relief Blend
HUGE 14 BOTTLE SET – In Beautiful High Quality 5ml Colored Glass Bottles

DON’T FALL VICTIM TO CHEAP DILUTED ROBBERS OIL – Most of the Competition Dilute Their Oil with a Cheap Carrier Oil or Even Other Potentially Dangerous Chemicals. Our Robbers Oil is Routinely Tested for Purity And Other Unique Qualities in Order to Ensure You Are Buying The Purest Oil Available.
PERFECT ESSENTIAL OIL STARTER SET – All of our most popular scents and blends, this Aromatherapy set is the Perfect Starter Set or Makes an Amazing Gift!

LIFETIME WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE – The manufacturer, Artizen Essential Oils, offers a lifetime warranty and guarantee on their product. If you are ever unsatisfied for any reason they will replace your product or refund your money. And they stand behind and guarantee the purity of their oils.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
